page.title: 04Hospital, Hillside,Montrose.
page.content: Sunnyside Royal Hospital is a hospital which caters for the problems of mental health.It deals with the{mentally ill}rather than the mentally handicapped and has around 350 patients.The first Lunatic Asylum in Scotland was set up in Montrose in 1781 due to the efforts of{Mrs. Susan {Carnegie.}It was moved to{Sunnyside, Hillside in 1858 when the Main Building was completed. There are three kinds of patient in the Hospital,short stay, long stay and geriatric and there are as many staff to care for them ranging from doctors to cobblers. The one big change has been the attempt to get more patients to live in their own communities. Now we recognise that mental illness can be cured or kept under control and Sunnyside is like any other hospital.
